articles.title: Kim Jong Un Gives Field Guidance to Construction Site of May 27 Fishery Station
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Gives Field Guidance to Construction Site of May 27 Fishery Station
Pyongyang, March 14 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, gave field guidance to the construction site of  the May 27 Fishery Station. 
					 The May 27 Fishery Station now under construction in an east coastal area on the personal initiative of Kim Jong Un will be the first modern pelagic fishery station to be built amid the drive for making a new history of big fish hauls. 
					
					 Going round the construction site, he learnt in detail about the progress made in the project and gave precious instructions for it. 
					
					 He recalled that President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il instructed that fishing operations should be conducted in the near and far-off seas while going out and coming back and pelagic fishing should be developed. It is necessary to carry out their behests for supplying much more fishes to the service personnel and people, he stressed, and went on:
					
					 "It is important to build well necessary facilities for the May 27 Fishery Station as it is a base for fishing operations by fleets of pelagic fishing boats and fish storing and processing. 
					
					 "In order to successfully build the fishery station it is necessary to build well a wharf capable of mooring several big boats alongside, breakwater and various kinds of facilities for sufficiently discharging, storing and processing fishes and all other facilities for the work and living of fishermen so that they may be impeccable even in distant future." 
					
					 Underscoring the need to push forward the construction project in a three dimensional manner in order to step up it, he personally solved the problems arising in the project including the supply of materials. 
					
					 He gave an instruction to meticulously organize from now the work for laying a strong material and technological foundation for the station and establishing the pelagic fishing method of Korean style so that it may start pelagic fishing soon after the construction is over. 
					
					 He noted that the enlarged meeting of the Central Military Commission of the Workers' Party of Korea discussed and decided on the issue related to the construction of the May 27 Fishery Station while discussing important strategic matters concerning national defence as the work for decisively boosting the nation's fishing industry is an important one for making the diet of the people more affluent and improving the supply service to the service personnel for the purpose of rounding off the combat preparations of the KPA. 
					
					 Underlining the need to reinforce construction forces to finish the construction of the station in the best quality within the date set by the party, he said that he would issue an order of the KPA Supreme Commander to large combined units of the KPA to form strong construction forces and dispatch them to the construction site. 
					
					 There may be a lot of bottlenecks and difficulties in building a modern pelagic fishery station, but he felt reassured as the project has been assigned to the KPA, a standard-bearer and shock force in implementing the party's idea and defending its policies, he said, calling for successfully and unconditionally winding up the project till the 70th founding anniversary of the party to demonstrate once again the fighting capability of the KPA before the world.

articles.title: North Side Committee for Implementing June 15 Joint Declaration Denounces U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Drills
articles.content:
North Side Committee for Implementing June 15 Joint Declaration Denounces U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Drills
Pyongyang, March 14 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the North Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration Friday made public a statement in denunciation of the U.S.-south Korea joint military drills against the DPRK. 
					 The statement bitterly condemned the drills as traitorous anti-reunification crime to block national reconciliation and unity, drive the inter-Korean relations into a worse catastrophe and bring nuclear disaster to Koreans.
					
					 It is needless to say that neither trust-worthy dialogue can be held nor the reunion of separated families and relatives be achieved under the grave situation in which distrust and confrontation among fellow countrymen are getting serious and the danger of military conflict and war is increasing, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 If the present grave situation is left intact, a nuclear war would break out though Koreans do not want it, and the Korean nation would fall victim to it. 
					
					 When a nuclear war against the DPRK breaks out owing to the U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces, the U.S. will finally end by the DPRK's standoff with it and great war for national reunification, and the den of the puppet forces where the U.S. imperialist aggression forces are stationed and their war servants are gathered will be annihilated. 
					
					 The U.S. should clearly see the ever-mounting spirit of the Koreans against the U.S. and war and their will for independent reunification, stop the reckless war moves and withdraw all aggression forces from south Korea at once. 
					
					 The south Korean authorities should know that if they persist in the moves for confrontation and war against fellow countrymen, turning a deaf ear to the enraged people's mindset and currying favor with the U.S., they will never evade a miserable defeat by the resolute protest and punishment of the whole nation. 
					
					 Whoever caring about the destiny of the nation should oppose the joint military drills with outside forces which are bringing nuclear disaster and turn out in the righteous and patriotic struggle to protect peace of the country and security of the nation. 
					
					 The south Koreans from all walks of life should more dynamically turn out in the struggle for smashing the dangerous moves of the U.S. and the puppet forces to ignite a nuclear war and thus root out the cause of confrontation and war on this land and bring about great changes in the north-south relations to actively join in glorifying this significant year as a historic one for opening up a wide avenue to independent reunification.

articles.title: Gymnasiums Built or Reconstructed in DPRK
articles.content:
Gymnasiums Built or Reconstructed in DPRK
Pyongyang, March 14 (KCNA) -- Gymnasiums have been built or reconstructed in different parts of the country.
					 A three-storied gymnasium was completed in Sinuiju City, North Phyongan Province with the Day of the Shining Star (February 16), leader Kim Jong Il's birthday, as an occasion.
					
					 The gymnasium can host more than 20 kinds of sports events.
					
					 A gymnasium in Sapho District, Hamhung City, South Hamgyong Province was fashionably reconstructed. And a gymnasium and a 1,000-seat stadium took their shapes at the Jaeryong Mine in South Hwanghae Province.

articles.title: Sci-Tech Information Service Given at Three-Revolution Exhibition House
articles.content:
Sci-Tech Information Service Given at Three-Revolution Exhibition House
Pyongyang, March 14 (KCNA) -- The Three-Revolution Exhibition House is giving various kinds of latest sci-tech information services to the working people, school youth and children visiting it.
					At least 600,000 pieces of sci-tech information were disseminated among about 576,000 visitors last year at the scientific and technological knowledge dissemination rooms.
					
					More than 48,000 people have visited the exhibition house since the outset of the year.
					
					 The visitors have an opportunity to learn about new technical achievements through science films and other video clips on sci-tech, common knowledge and features available at the rooms.
					
					 Drawing visitors are 3-D science and education films such as "Fundamentals of 3-D Video" and "Satellite" at the sci-tech knowledge dissemination room of the exhibition of electronics industry.  
					
					 The exhibitions of heavy industry, agriculture and light industry are also attracting the attention of visitors. 
					
					 The new technical innovation exhibition is providing peculiar services such as domestic and foreign patent data service, sci-tech lecture and new technical exchange on the basis of the successes showcased at sci-tech festivals, exhibitions and expos.

articles.title: DPRK Army, People Will Never Tolerate U.S. Nuclear War: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
DPRK Army, People Will Never Tolerate U.S. Nuclear War: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, March 14 (KCNA) -- The army and people of the DPRK harden their will never to tolerate the foolish moves of the U.S. going rampant to inflict the holocaust of a nuclear war on the Korean nation.
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday says this in an article.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The U.S. imperialists have kicked off joint military exercises for the sinister purpose of stifling the DPRK and toppling the Korean-style socialist system centered on the popular masses even by waging a nuclear war.
					
					 The U.S. is spearheading its hostile policy towards the DPRK to overthrow it.
					
					 The president, all institutions of the administration, all sorts of spy and plot-breeding organizations and strategy and policy institutes in the U.S. have gone desperate in their moves to lead the DPRK to a "collapse". 
					
					 Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises are used as a military means for implementing the U.S. vicious hostile policy towards the DPRK.
					
					 Nuclear war is not a game.
					
					 If the U.S. thinks it can survive and win the nuclear war, it will be a delusion of an idiot.
					
					 Defeat is a law-governing tradition of the U.S. No force on earth can break this law.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists should not misjudge the firm will of the army and people of the DPRK to mercilessly smash the anti-DPRK hysterics and eliminate the source of evils.

articles.title: S. Korean Intelligence Service Indicted for Abuse of Power
articles.content:
S. Korean Intelligence Service Indicted for Abuse of Power
Pyongyang, March 14 (KCNA) -- The Citizens Solidarity for Democratic Society in south Korea on March 10 filed a suit with the Seoul Central District Prosecutor's Office against the abuse of power by the director and staff members of the puppet Intelligence Service (IS).
					 It was open to public through media that in April 2009 the Intelligence Service cooked up the case of illegal fund of Roh Moo Hyun and floated the rumor, the organization said, adding it was obviously excess of authority.
					
					 It said that there is evidence that during the Lee Myung Bak regime the IS abused power to obstruct and watch activities of civic and public organizations.
					
					 It exposed that in 2008 the IS investigated university professors opposed to the project for improving four large rivers pushed forward by the regime and put pressure on those enterprises which supported civic and public organizations.
					
					 It is necessary to make a thoroughgoing probe into the truth about the IS's abuse of power during the Lee Myung Bak regime, it said, calling for setting up an independent investigation body.

articles.title: S. Korean Punished for Praising DPRK
articles.content:
S. Korean Punished for Praising DPRK
Pyongyang, March 14 (KCNA) -- The puppet Chunchon District Court of south Korea sentenced an inhabitant to one year and six months in prison and one year's suspension of qualifications on charges of violation of the draconian "Security Law", according to Yonhap News in south Korea.
					 The court took such action for the mere reason that he kept "literature benefiting enemy", regarded the north as a companion for reunification and dialogue partner and praised its Songun politics and building of a thriving nation that can never co-exist with "liberal democracy."
					
					 He has been suppressed by the puppet security authorities for posting articles and pictures on the reality of the north on an internet paper from July, 2011 to March last year.

articles.title: S. Korean Plot-Breeding Organization against Reunification Should Be Dissolved: CPRK
articles.content:
S. Korean Plot-Breeding Organization against Reunification Should Be Dissolved: CPRK
Pyongyang, March 14 (KCNA) -- On March 10, Jong Jong Uk, vice-chairman of the south Korean "preparatory committee for unification", opened to public at a working breakfast the fact that there existed "a team for unification lacking agreement and unification of social systems" in the "preparatory committee for unification" and confessed that they were preparing in secret "other form of unification without south-north agreement" and other organization in the regime was also studying the "unification of social systems."
					 He went the lengths of letting loose a spate of sophism that the regime had a concrete measure to deal with people of various social origins in the north in case of "unification through absorption of social system."
					
					 A spokesman for the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea (CPRK) issued a statement on Saturday in this regard: 
					
					 In the past the puppet group trumpeted about "unification of social systems" and "unification through absorption" whenever an opportunity presented itself. But this is the first time that it openly disclosed the inside story about its scenario. 
					
					 The disclosure of this fact sparked off uproar in south Korea, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 Much upset by this, puppet Chongwadae and the coteries of the "preparatory committee for unification" claimed that "it was not true" and let him appear before media persons to assert that the "preparatory team for unification through absorption" didn't exist in a bid to evade the catastrophic consequences to be entailed by his remarks. But this is like crying over spilt milk. 
					
					 As far as the "preparatory committee for unification" is concerned, it was set up as a mechanism directly under the "president" and its chairperson is Park Geun Hye herself. It was created by Park in July last year involving the authorities, political camp and NGOs including the puppet Ministry of Unification, Ministry of Foreign Affairs, Intelligence Service, Ministry of Justice and "National Assembly" under the pretext of working out a "blueprint for peace and unification" and "constitution for unification" for the purpose of realizing the "confidence-building process on the Korean peninsula".
					
					 The successive rulers of south Korea had dreamt of wild ambition for confrontation of social systems and "unification through absorption" but there were no such heinous anti-reunification confrontation maniacs as the present puppet forces keen on confrontation of social systems by making the above-said team.
					
					 The puppet forces, having an axe to grind and daggers hidden behind belts to hurt fellow countrymen, are talking  about "dialogue", "confidence" and "improved relations". This is an unpardonable mockery and insult to the DPRK and the south Korean people's mindset, public opinion at home and abroad and all Koreans. 
					
					 The puppet forces are no more than cat's paws disgustingly kowtowing to their U.S. master keen to bring the dark clouds of nuclear war to the nation and colonial stooges who cannot exist even a moment without the U.S. backing. Yet, they are crying out for "unification of social systems" and "unification through absorption" in an effort to bring down the inviolable and dignified social system in the DPRK. This is nothing but a silly charade that makes the boiled head of a cow provoke a side-splitting laughter.
					
					 The "unification through absorption" touted by the puppet group is no more than a daydream.
					
					 The DPRK asserts the improved inter-Korean relations and peace and reunification not because it does not know other form and method of reunification or it lacks strength and ability.  
					
					 Park Geun Hye, as the head of the "preparatory committee for unification", should give a clear and responsible clarification of those outbursts and make apology for them before the entire nation and dissolve at once the "committee."
					
					 Park should know that if she fails to do so, the DPRK will not deal with the present south Korean authorities.

articles.title: Action for Settlement of Sexual Slavery Issue Staged in Seoul
articles.content:
Action for Settlement of Sexual Slavery Issue Staged in Seoul
Pyongyang, March 14 (KCNA) -- The 1169th Wednesday meeting demanding the settlement of the issue of sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army took place outside the Japanese embassy in Seoul on Mar. 11, according to a south Korean internet paper.
					 It was attended by members of the Council for the Solution of the Issue of the Volunteers Corps and other women's organizations, victims of sexual slavery and citizens.
					
					 A statement was read out at the meeting.
					
					 The statement recalled that the U.N. and the international community branded the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese army as an organized crime against humanity and a war crime and persistently demanded the Japanese government admit and make an apology and reparation for the past crimes. 
					
					 This being a hard reality, the Japanese government has become evermore undisguised in its moves to turn Japan into a military power, it noted, adding:
					
					 The action to force Japan to pay for its past crimes will be ceaselessly staged.
					
					 At the end of the meeting, the participants marched from the Japanese embassy premise to Kwanghwamun Square.

articles.title: Union of Korean Students in Japan Meets
articles.content:
Union of Korean Students in Japan Meets
Tokyo, March 13 (KNS-KCNA) -- The 36th Congress of the Union of Korean Students in Japan took place in Osaka, Japan on March 7.
					 Present there were officials of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) and deputies to it.
					
					 Kim Hyon Il, chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the union, in a report said that the union has made achievements in the work to expand and consolidate its mass foundation, the movement for national reunification and external activities.
					
					 He underlined the need to energetically conduct the work with Korean youth and students and make a leap forward in the Korean community this year marking the 70th anniversary of the formation of the union and thus actively contribute to ushering in a new heyday of Chongryon.
					
					 O Jae Se, director of the Organizational Bureau of the Chongryon Central Standing Committee, underscored the need to instill the tradition of loyalty, patriotism and unity recorded in the 70 year-long history of the union into its members. 
					
					 Speeches were made by its deputies.

articles.title: Kimjongilia Wins First Prize of International Flower Exhibition Held in Mongolia
articles.content:
Kimjongilia Wins First Prize of International Flower Exhibition Held in Mongolia
Pyongyang, March 14 (KCNA) -- The first prize of the International Flower Exhibition in Mongolia went to Kimjongilia, immortal flower praising the great man. 
					 Presented to the exhibition held from March 6 to 8 were rare flowers from different countries including the DPR of Korea, Mongolia and Japan. 
					
					 More than 300 potted Kimjongilias splendidly decorated the wing of the DPRK. On display there were photos of diplomas and medals which Kimjongilia won in world horticultural expos and exhibitions. 
					
					 Everyday the wing of the DPRK was crowded with personages, horticulturalists and flower-fans of different countries who were attracted by the red and beautiful Kimjongilias. 
					
					 The visitors said that the world does not know such a beautiful flower as Kimjongilia. 
					
					 The general director of a Mongolian company said that the exhibition was splendidly and uniquely decorated thanks to Kimjongilias named after the peerlessly great man.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Birth Anniversary to Be Celebrated in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Birth Anniversary to Be Celebrated in Russia
Pyongyang, March 14 (KCNA) -- A Karelia, Russia, preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung was inaugurated on March 9. 
					 Victor Yegorov, chairman of the Karelia-DPRK Friendship Association, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee. 
					
					 The committee decided to hold political and cultural events praising the sacred revolutionary career and undying exploits of Kim Il Sung from March 9 to April 17.

articles.title: Happy Life of Korean Women Introduced by German Body
articles.content:
Happy life of Korean Women Introduced by German Body
Pyongyang, March 14 (KCNA) -- The Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany posted articles on its website on Sunday, the March 8 International Women's Day.
					 The website in an article titled "Korean women under good care of the sun" says:
					
					 Greeting the March 8 International Women's Day, the Korean women feel great happiness and pride with which they have enjoyed a worthy life as the flowers of families and society under the good care of the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 President Kim Il Sung, with deep insight into the position and role of the women in the revolution and construction in his early days when he embarked upon the road of revolution, gave origin to the Korean women's movement.
					
					 After liberation of Korea, he organized the Democratic Women's Union of Korea, drew up and promulgated the Law on Sex Equality and thus helped the women take an active part in the social activities with the same right as men.
					
					 Anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk visited factories and rural areas and aroused the women to the struggle for building a new country.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il made public his historic work "Women Are a Dynamic Force Pushing Ahead with the Revolution and Construction" on March 8, 1995 and put the women's dignity on the highest stage.
					
					 Marshal Kim Jong Un had a photo session with the participants of the 4th National Meeting of Mothers and said that it is the great pride of the Workers' Party and people of Korea to have excellent mothers who are fulfilling their duty for the country and nation with ardent patriotism. 
					
					 The Korean women being eternally blessed by Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il are enjoying a happy life under the loving care of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The website also carried an article titled "Korean women, their yesterday and today seen through songs".

articles.title: Ghanaian Party Slams U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Drills
articles.content:
Ghanaian Party Slams U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Drills
Pyongyang, March 14 (KCNA) -- The National Democratic Congress of Ghana on March 9 made public a statement denouncing the joint military drills Key Resolve and Foal Eagle for aggression kicked off by the U.S. imperialists and south Korean puppet group. 
					 The statement said: 
					
					 The National Democratic Congress of Ghana resolutely denounces the joint military drills as extreme aggression moves disturbing peace and security of the Korean peninsula and the rest of the world.
					
					 The U.S. and the south Korean authorities started the joint military drills again on the Korean peninsula that has constantly been exposed to the danger of war. This is a serious threat to the Korean people desirous of peaceful development and prosperity and inhuman crime that plunges the world into a new nuclear disaster. 
					
					 The U.S. and the south Korean authorities should clearly face up to the trend of the times and stop at once the dangerous war exercises. 
					
					 We extend full support to the struggle of the Korean people to defuse the danger of war and protect peace.

articles.title: KFA Denounces Key Resolve and Foal Eagle
articles.content:
KFA Denounces Key Resolve and Foal Eagle
Pyongyang, March 14 (KCNA) -- The Korean Friendship Association (KFA) headquartered in Spain made public a statement on Mar. 10 in denunciation of the adventurous Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises kicked off by the U.S. imperialists and south Korean puppet forces.
					 The statement said:
					
					 We strongly condemn Key Resolve and Foal Eagle.
					
					 They are dangerous nuclear war exercises aimed at a surprise preemptive attack on the DPRK.
					
					 The matchless Korean People's Army is fully ready to promptly counter any aggression and provocation by the imperialists.
					
					 The south Korean puppet forces had better mind that they are bound to ruin if they follow the outsiders.
					
					 There is a limit to the magnanimity and patience of the DPRK.
					
					 If the U.S. and its followers make even the slightest provocation, the DPRK will mercilessly wipe out the aggressors.
					
					 With nothing can they break the single-minded unity of the army and people of the DPRK rallied close behind Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The U.S. desperate moves to stifle the DPRK will only precipitate the former's ruin.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recorre el campo de construccion de empresa pesquera 27 de Mayo
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recorre el campo de construccion de empresa pesquera 27 de Mayo
Pyongyang, 14 de marzo (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, recorrio el campo de construccion de la empresa pesquera 27 de Mayo.
					La empresa que se construye por la iniciativa directa del Mariscal en la zona del Mar Este es una moderna empresa de pesca de alta mar que se levanta por primera vez en medio de la campana por crear la nueva historia del mar de oro.
					
					Recorriendo el campo de construccion, dio instrucciones para la construccion tras hacer detallado conocimiento del estado de obra.
					
					Recordo que el Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il dijeron que debian pescar tanto en el mar cercano como en alta mar, tanto al salir al mar como al regresar del mar y desarrollar la pesca en alta mar, y subrayo que al materializar el legado de los lideres, debemos capturar mucho mas los peces para suministrarlos a los militares y pueblo.
					
					Senalo que la empresa es una base de pescar en alta mar, almacenar y elaborar los pescados, razon por la cual es importante acondicionar bien las instalaciones necesarias.
					
					Enfatizo que para levantar excelentemente la empresa, hay que construir el muelle, rompeolas, las otras instalaciones perfectas necesarias al descargue, almacenamiento y elaboracion de pescados y otros necesarios al trabajo y la vida de los pescadores.
					
					Al referirse a la importancia de impulsar de manera tridimensional la obra en el terreno para acelerar la construccion, soluciono en personal el abastecimiento de materiales y otros problemas que se presentan en la obra.
					
					Ordeno preparar bien la base material y tecnica de la empresa para que inmediatamente despues de la construccion, los barcos salieran a alta mar para pescar, y esmerar desde ahora las labores para establecer el metodo tipico de pesca en alta mar.
					
					Puntualizo que desarrollar decisivamente la industria pesquera del pais es un trabajo importante para mejorar mas la vida alimentaria del pueblo y perfeccionar los preparativos de combate del ejercito popular al mejorar la intendencia de los militares, razon por la cual en la reunion ampliada de la Comision Militar Central del PTC, en que deliberan los importantes temas estrategicos relacionados con la defensa nacional, discutio y decidio el asunto relativo a la construccion de la empresa pesquera 27 de Mayo.
					
					Apunto que deben enviar mas las poderosas fuerzas de construccion para que la obra se termine hasta el dia fijado por el partido y agrego que dara a las grandes unidades combinadas del EPC una orden del Comandante Supremo del EPC de formar y enviar las poderosas fuerzas de construccion.
					
					Al decir que en la construccion de la moderna empresa habra muchas dificultades, destaco que esta tranquilo porque encargo la obra al ejercito popular, abanderado y brigada de la campana de materializacion de la idea del partido y la defensa de la politica del partido y exhorto a demostrar otra vez a todo el mundo la combatividad del ejercito popular al terminar magnificamente la obra hasta el 70o aniversario de la fundacion del PTC.

articles.title: Construidos y remodelados en RPDC centros de deportes
articles.content:
Construidos y remodelados en RPDC centros de deportes
Pyongyang, 14 de marzo (ACNC) -- Se ha levantado en la ciudad de Sinuiju de la provincia de Phyong-an del Norte nuevo gimnasio de tres pisos.
					Se puede realizar ahi los ejercicios y competencias de mas de 20 disciplinas, entre otras, el baloncesto, voleibol, tenis de mesa, boxeo, lucha, gimnasia artistica, Sirum (lucha tradicional de Corea) y Taekwon-do, y auspiciar actos deportivos.
					
					Tambien, estan acondicionados la sala de investigacion cientifica, el salon de entrenamiento, comedor, bano, tienda de equipos y materiales deportivos y otras instalaciones que facilitan el confort de los entrenadores y jugadores.
					
					El gimnasio tiene un techo en forma de arco y sus paredes interiores y exteriores estan adornadas con el vidrio y azulejos superfinos.
					
					Fue inaugurado con motivo del Dia de la Estrella Luz de este ano (16 de febrero, dia de nacimiento del Dirigente Kim Jong Il).
					
					Mientras tanto, el centro de deportes, situado en el municipio de Sapho de la ciudad de Hamhung de la provincia de Hamgyong del Sur, fue remodelado excelentemente a las alturas del nuevo siglo.
					
					Los constructores lo reconstruyeron en un corto plazo como establecimiento polivalente.
					
					Por otra parte, se edificaron un moderno gimnasio y estadio con mas de mil asientos en la Mina de Jaeryong, base productora de minerales de hierro situada en la provincia de Hwanghae del Sur.
					
					Las bases deportivas, que se construyen por doquier, contribuyen al desarrollo deportivo del pais.

articles.title: Coreanos no toleraran el intento de guerra nuclear de EE.UU., advierte Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Coreanos no toleraran el intento de guerra nuclear de EE.UU., advierte Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, 14 de marzo (ACNC) -- Los militares y civiles coreanos tienen la ferrea voluntad de no tolerar jamas la absurdidad de EE.UU. que se desespera por acarrear el nubarron de la guerra nuclear a la nacion coreana, adelanta el diario Rodong Sinmun en un articulo individual de este sabado y continua:
					EE.UU. desarrolla los ejercicios belicos conjuntos con el malsano intento de atropellar a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea mediante la guerra nuclear y derrocar su regimen socialista centrado en las masas populares. 
					
					Ahora la politica norteamericana sobre la RPDC se enfoca en derrocarla. 
					
					El mandatario, los organos de la administracion, los aparatos de inteligencia e intrigas y los institutos estrategicos y politicos de EE.UU. se enfrascan en inducir el "derrumbe" de la RPDC. 
					
					Los simulacros militares conjuntos Key Resolve y Foal Eagle se utilizan como medio militar para la ejecucion de la politica norteamericana de hostilidad a la RPDC. 
					
					La guerra nuclear no es un juego. 
					
					Si EE.UU. piensa en que podria triunfar en la guerra nuclear, esto es una ilusion de un idiota. 
					
					La derrota es la tradicion logica de EE.UU. 
					
					El imperio norteamericano debe conocer bien la voluntad del ejercito y pueblo coreanos de castigar despiadadamente a los psicopatas anti-RPDC y eliminar la fuente de maldad.
